desmoj.core.observer

Interface Observer<T,X>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Class of an possible Subject
    X - Type of the Event which is passed in the update Method

    public interface Observer<T,X>
    Interface which an Observer class can implement to get Information from a Subject Class

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void update(T subject, X eventObject)
      This Method is called when a Subject calls his notify Method

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(T subject,
            X eventObject)
        This Method is called when a Subject calls his notify Method
        Parameters:
        subject - Reference to the calling Subject
        eventObject - An eventtype to have the chance of Making branches for the different eventtypes
